author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #38666
GEM Run3 modifier setup for the alignment.

@hyunyong @jshlee @watson-ij  since we are very tight with times I took the liberty of opening the backport, it is a verbatim copy of Hynyong's master PR.

#### PR validation:
Code compiles

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #38666
title: [12_4_X] Run3 GEMGeometryBuilder Run3 modifier
